courses.title: Leren wokken
courses.author: Petra
courses.intro_text_1: In deze cursus leer je de basisprincipes van het wokken en hoe je heerlijke gerechten kunt bereiden.
courses.intro_text_2: Ontdek verschillende woktechnieken en leer hoe je smaakvolle combinaties kunt maken.
courses.ingredients_intro: Hier is een lijst met ingrediënten die je nodig hebt voor de gerechten:
courses.ingredients_list: 1 eetlepel plantaardige olie, 300 g kipfilet (in blokjes), 1 rode paprika (in reepjes), 1 gele paprika (in reepjes), 1 ui (gesnipperd), 2 teentjes knoflook (fijngehakt), 2 eetlepels sojasaus, 1 eetlepel oestersaus, 1 theelepel sesamolie, zout en peper naar smaak
courses.ingredients_additional_info: Zorg ervoor dat je alle ingrediënten van tevoren klaarzet en bereidt.
courses.roadmap_intro: Volg deze stappen om het wokproces te doorlopen:
courses.roadmap: Stap 1: Verhit de plantaardige olie in een wokpan op hoog vuur. Voeg de kipfilet toe en bak tot het gaar is. Haal de kip uit de pan en zet apart. Stap 2: Voeg de paprika, ui en knoflook toe aan de wokpan en roerbak gedurende 3-4 minuten, tot ze knapperig zijn. Stap 3: Voeg de gebakken kip toe aan de groenten in de pan. Giet de sojasaus, oestersaus en sesamolie erbij. Roerbak alles samen gedurende 1-2 minuten. Stap 4: Breng op smaak met zout en peper. Serveer direct en geniet van je heerlijke wokgerecht!
courses.roadmap_additional_info: Experimenteer met verschillende groenten en sauzen om je eigen unieke wokrecepten te creëren.

courses.title: Pasta Recipes
courses.author: Maria
courses.intro_text_1: Learn how to make mouthwatering pasta dishes from scratch with this comprehensive course.
courses.intro_text_2: Discover the art of making various pasta shapes and explore different pasta sauces.
courses.ingredients_intro: Here is a list of ingredients you'll need for the recipes:
courses.ingredients_list: 250g pasta, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 3 cloves garlic (minced), 1 onion (chopped), 400g canned tomatoes, 1 teaspoon dried basil, 1 teaspoon dried oregano, salt and pepper to taste
courses.ingredients_additional_info: Make sure to have all the ingredients prepared and ready before starting.
courses.roadmap_intro: Follow these steps to prepare delicious pasta dishes:
courses.roadmap: Step 1: Cook the pasta according to package instructions. Step 2: Heat olive oil in a pan and sauté garlic and onion until fragrant. Step 3: Add canned tomatoes, basil, and oregano. Simmer for 10 minutes. Step 4: Drain the cooked pasta and add it to the sauce. Mix well. Step 5: Season with salt and pepper. Serve hot and enjoy!
courses.roadmap_additional_info: Experiment with different pasta shapes and sauces to create your own unique recipes.

courses.title: Baking Basics
courses.author: Emily
courses.intro_text_1: Master the essential baking techniques and create delectable homemade treats.
courses.intro_text_2: Learn the secrets to perfect cakes, cookies, and pastries.
courses.ingredients_intro: Here is a list of ingredients you'll need for the recipes:
courses.ingredients_list: 200g all-purpose flour, 150g unsalted butter (softened), 150g granulated sugar, 3 eggs, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1 teaspoon baking powder, a pinch of salt
courses.ingredients_additional_info: Ensure all the ingredients are at room temperature before starting.
courses.roadmap_intro: Follow these steps to create delicious baked goods:
courses.roadmap: Step 1: Preheat the oven to the desired temperature. Step 2: Cream the butter and sugar together until light and fluffy. Step 3: Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition. Step 4: Stir in the vanilla extract. Step 5: In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, and salt. Step 6: Gradually add the dry ingredients to the butter mixture and mix until just combined. Step 7: Transfer the batter to a greased baking pan. Step 8: Bake in the preheated oven for the specified time. Step 9: Remove from the oven and let cool before serving.
courses.roadmap_additional_info: Experiment with different flavors and decorations to add your own personal touch.

courses.title: Asian Cuisine
courses.author: Zhongli
courses.intro_text_1: Explore the vibrant and diverse flavors of Asian fusion cuisine.
courses.intro_text_2: Learn how to create delicious dishes inspired by the culinary traditions of Asia.
courses.ingredients_intro: Here is a list of ingredients you'll need for the recipes:
courses.ingredients_list: 2 cups cooked jasmine rice, 200g chicken breast (sliced), 1 bell pepper (sliced), 1 carrot (julienned), 1 onion (sliced), 2 cloves garlic (minced), 2 tablespoons soy sauce, 1 tablespoon oyster sauce, 1 teaspoon sesame oil, salt and pepper to taste
courses.ingredients_additional_info: Prepare all the ingredients and have them ready before you start cooking.
courses.roadmap_intro: Follow these steps to create flavorful Asian fusion dishes:
courses.roadmap: Step 1: Heat oil in a wok or pan and cook the chicken until browned. Set aside. Step 2: In the same pan, stir-fry the vegetables until tender-crisp. Step 3: Return the chicken to the pan and add soy sauce, oyster sauce, and sesame oil. Stir-fry for a few more minutes. Step 4: Season with salt and pepper. Step 5: Serve the stir-fried chicken and vegetables over cooked jasmine rice. Enjoy!
courses.roadmap_additional_info: Experiment with different combinations of vegetables and sauces to create your own unique Asian fusion recipes.

courses.title: Spanish Delights
courses.author: Maria
courses.intro_text_1: Embark on a culinary journey to the Mediterranean with these delightful recipes.
courses.intro_text_2: Discover the rich flavors and healthy ingredients that make Mediterranean cuisine so popular.
courses.ingredients_intro: Here is a list of ingredients you'll need for the recipes:
courses.ingredients_list: 2 cups cherry tomatoes, 1 cucumber (diced), 1 red onion (sliced), 1 bell pepper (sliced), 200g feta cheese (crumbled), 1/4 cup Kalamata olives, 2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, salt and pepper to taste
courses.ingredients_additional_info: Make sure to use fresh and high-quality ingredients for the best results.
courses.roadmap_intro: Follow these steps to create Mediterranean-inspired dishes:
courses.roadmap: Step 1: In a large bowl, combine the cherry tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, bell pepper, feta cheese, and Kalamata olives. Step 2: In a small bowl, whisk together the olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper to make the dressing. Step 3: Drizzle the dressing over the salad and toss to combine. Step 4: Serve the Mediterranean salad as a refreshing appetizer or side dish.
courses.roadmap_additional_info: Feel free to add your favorite Mediterranean herbs and spices to enhance the flavors.

courses.title: Gourmet Pizza
courses.author: Luigi
courses.intro_text_1: Learn the art of making gourmet pizzas from scratch with this hands-on course.
courses.intro_text_2: Discover the techniques for creating delicious dough, flavorful sauces, and creative toppings.
courses.ingredients_intro: Here is a list of ingredients you'll need for the recipes:
courses.ingredients_list: 2 cups all-purpose flour, 1 teaspoon instant yeast, 1 teaspoon sugar, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 3/4 cup warm water, 2 tablespoons olive oil, pizza sauce, mozzarella cheese, your favorite toppings
courses.ingredients_additional_info: Feel free to experiment with different cheeses, meats, and vegetables for your toppings.
courses.roadmap_intro: Follow these steps to create gourmet pizzas:
courses.roadmap: Step 1: In a large bowl, combine the flour, instant yeast, sugar, and salt. Step 2: Gradually add warm water and olive oil to the mixture. Mix until the dough comes together. Step 3: Knead the dough on a floured surface until smooth and elastic. Step 4: Place the dough in a greased bowl, cover with a damp cloth, and let it rise for about an hour. Step 5: Preheat the oven to the highest temperature. Step 6: Roll out the dough into your desired pizza shape. Step 7: Spread pizza sauce over the dough and add your favorite toppings. Step 8: Bake in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes or until the crust is golden and the cheese is melted and bubbly. Step 9: Remove from the oven and let it cool slightly before slicing and serving.
courses.roadmap_additional_info: Get creative with your pizza toppings and try new flavor combinations.

courses.title: Smoothies
courses.author: Julia
courses.intro_text_1: Discover the world of healthy and delicious smoothies with this refreshing course.
courses.intro_text_2: Learn how to make nutritious smoothies packed with vitamins and minerals.
courses.ingredients_intro: Here is a list of ingredients you'll need for the recipes:
courses.ingredients_list: 1 banana, 1 cup mixed berries, 1 cup spinach, 1/2 cup almond milk, 1 tablespoon honey, ice cubes (optional)
courses.ingredients_additional_info: Feel free to customize your smoothies with additional fruits, vegetables, or superfood powders.
courses.roadmap_intro: Follow these steps to create healthy and refreshing smoothies:
courses.roadmap: Step 1: Place all the ingredients in a blender. Step 2: Blend until smooth and creamy. Step 3: If desired, add ice cubes and blend again until chilled. Step 4: Pour the smoothie into a glass and enjoy!
courses.roadmap_additional_info: Experiment with different flavor combinations and adjust the sweetness to your taste.

courses.title: Bread Baking
courses.author: Bart
courses.intro_text_1: Master the art of artisan bread baking and create crusty, flavorful loaves at home.
courses.intro_text_2: Learn the techniques for working with different types of dough and achieving professional results.
courses.ingredients_intro: Here is a list of ingredients you'll need for the recipes:
courses.ingredients_list: 500g bread flour, 10g instant yeast, 10g salt, 350ml water
courses.ingredients_additional_info: Consider using high-quality bread flour for the best texture and flavor.
courses.roadmap_intro: Follow these steps to bake artisan bread:
courses.roadmap: Step 1: In a large bowl, combine the bread flour, instant yeast, and salt. Step 2: Gradually add water and mix until the dough comes together. Step 3: Knead the dough on a floured surface for about 10 minutes or until smooth and elastic. Step 4: Place the dough in a greased bowl, cover with a damp cloth, and let it rise for about 1-2 hours or until doubled in size. Step 5: Preheat the oven to the desired temperature. Step 6: Shape the dough into a loaf or rolls. Step 7: Place the shaped dough on a baking sheet or in a loaf pan. Step 8: Let the dough rise for another 30-45 minutes. Step 9: Bake in the preheated oven for about 20-30 minutes or until golden brown and sounds hollow when tapped. Step 10: Remove from the oven and let it cool on a wire rack before slicing and serving.
courses.roadmap_additional_info: Experiment with different types of flours, seeds, and spices to create unique bread variations.

courses.title: Sushi Making
courses.author: Xiangling
courses.intro_text_1: Immerse yourself in the art of sushi making with this comprehensive masterclass.
courses.intro_text_2: Learn the techniques for preparing sushi rice, rolling sushi rolls, and creating beautiful presentations.
courses.ingredients_intro: Here is a list of ingredients you'll need for sushi making:
courses.ingredients_list: Sushi rice, nori seaweed sheets, fresh fish or vegetables for filling, soy sauce, wasabi, pickled ginger
courses.ingredients_additional_info: Ensure you have all the necessary tools, such as a bamboo sushi mat and sharp knives, for sushi making.
courses.roadmap_intro: Follow these steps to create delicious sushi rolls:
courses.roadmap: Step 1: Prepare sushi rice according to the package instructions. Step 2: Place a sheet of nori on a bamboo sushi mat. Step 3: Wet your hands and spread a thin layer of sushi rice on the nori, leaving a small border at the top. Step 4: Add your choice of filling ingredients along the bottom edge of the rice. Step 5: Roll the sushi tightly using the bamboo mat, applying gentle pressure. Step 6: Use a sharp knife to slice the sushi roll into bite-sized pieces. Step 7: Serve the sushi rolls with soy sauce, wasabi, and pickled ginger.
courses.roadmap_additional_info: Experiment with different fillings and sushi roll variations to create your own sushi masterpieces.

courses.title: French Pastry
courses.author: Hans
courses.intro_text_1: Indulge in the world of French pastries and learn the secrets of classic delicacies.
courses.intro_text_2: Master the art of creating flaky croissants, creamy éclairs, and elegant tarts.
courses.ingredients_intro: Here is a list of ingredients commonly used in French pastry recipes:
courses.ingredients_list: Butter, flour, eggs, sugar, milk, vanilla extract, chocolate, fruits, pastry cream
courses.ingredients_additional_info: Each French pastry recipe may require specific ingredients and techniques.
courses.roadmap_intro: Follow these steps to create French pastry delights:
courses.roadmap: Step 1: Prepare the dough or batter according to the specific recipe. Step 2: Shape the dough or pour the batter into the desired forms. Step 3: Bake the pastries in a preheated oven until golden brown and cooked through. Step 4: Allow the pastries to cool completely before filling or decorating. Step 5: Fill the pastries with pastry cream, whipped cream, or other delicious fillings. Step 6: Decorate the pastries with chocolate ganache, fruit compote, or powdered sugar. Step 7: Enjoy the French pastry creations!
courses.roadmap_additional_info: French pastry requires precision and attention to detail. Practice and patience will help you achieve the best results.
